phases.title: Verify repository structure
phases.description: Verify the repository structure is intact by checking that the key directories exist: packages/shared, packages/framework, and apps/desktop.
phases.verification: All three directories exist and contain expected files

phases.title: Verify package.json configurations
phases.description: Check that root and workspace package.json files have valid configurations and expected workspace references.
tasks: Read root package.json and verify workspaces field
Read packages/shared/package.json and verify name is @tiki/shared
Read apps/desktop/package.json and verify it exists
phases.verification: All package.json files are valid and contain expected fields

phases.title: Verify Tiki state system
phases.description: Confirm the .tiki directory structure is intact with state.json and plans directory.
tasks: Confirm .tiki/state.json exists and is valid JSON
Verify state.json has expected schema (schemaVersion, activeWork, history)
phases.verification: .tiki state system is intact and functional

phases.title: Verify git status
phases.description: Check that the git repository is in a clean state and on the expected branch.
tasks: Run git status to check working tree state
Confirm we are on the main branch
phases.verification: Git repository is properly configured with remote
